title: Nature's Secret: Simple Rules=/=Simple Behavior (Wolfram's Computational Irreducibility & Entropy)
description:
Flying Solo again, this time starting to work through the first 6 minutes or so of the Wolfram/Fridman 3 1/2 hour conversation. (See the first conversation Michael and I had about Wolfram's TOE:  https://youtu.be/SzUEzVZiAoo)

Symbolic Manipulation Programs
Computational Primitives
Simple Rules
Cellular Automata
Combinatorial Explosion
Entropy
The Nature of Reality

Here's the link to the Wolfram/Fridman talk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4-SGpEInX_c
